Room.Name: Dragons and Brimstone Exhibit
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large room that tries to recreate the Valley of the Dragons in the Enchanted Forest. Strong adventurers might enjoy a trek into that valley, and may find the dragons here rather young compared to the forest.
Room.LongDescription: There are a number of dragons you've never seen before, but also several of your favorites. This room is quite large and there are two very wide exits to the east, one on the north side of the east wall and one on the south side of the wall. When the sign said "Brimstone", they meant it. There are lots of hot rocks and what appears to be simulated lava flow.
